channel.title: The Firefly Chronicles
channel.description: Iris Firemoon and guests talk about Paganism, Wicca, Witchcraft, Druid, Ceremonial, etc. Just your average Pagan podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Iris Firemoon
channel.itunes:summary: Here you will find discussions on various topics in Wicca and Witchcraft, as well as current events, pagan news, and other tidbits.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 81
item.description: Episode 81 showcases an old interview from PSG 2011 about a peer-reviewed law article on Paganism in court cases.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 81 showcases an old interview from PSG 2011 about a peer-reviewed law article on Paganism in court cases.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 80
item.description: Episode 80 includes a press conference with Patrick McCollum, Circle Sanctuary minister and Wiccan elder, about the recent 9th Circuit Court ruling against his religious discrimination claims.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 80 includes a press conference with Patrick McCollum, Circle Sanctuary minister and Wiccan elder, about the recent 9th Circuit Court ruling against his religious discrimination claims.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 79
item.description: Episode 79 comments on the first day of Pagan Spirit Gathering 2011 with Star Foster, Cara Shultz, and Peter Dybing.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 79 comments on the first day of Pagan Spirit Gathering 2011 with Star Foster, Cara Shultz, and Peter Dybing.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 78
item.description: Episode 78 discusses the Pagan value of giving as a part of the 2011 Pagan Values Blogject.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 78 discusses the Pagan value of giving as a part of the 2011 Pagan Values Blogject.

item.description: Episode 77 - Adventures at the 2011 Mythic Faire.

item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 74 - Iris Firemoon, David Salisbury, Patrick Quinn, and LaVada Niamba Damarra detail their experiences during Day 1 of the Sacred Space Conference.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 73
item.description: Episode 73 - We start planning Northern Virginia Pagan Pride Day.  Here's some information and tips on what's involved and our process.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 73 - We start planning Northern Virginia Pagan Pride Day.  Here's some information and tips on what's involved and our process.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 70
item.description: Episode 70 - Katrina Messenger, Iris Firemoon, David Salisbury, and Angela Raincatcher share their stories about what Paganism is.  From a documentary produced by Iris and David and entered into the Pluralism Project film festival.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 70 - Katrina Messenger, Iris Firemoon, David Salisbury, and Angela Raincatcher share their stories about what Paganism is.  From a documentary produced by Iris and David and entered into the Pluralism Project film festival.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 28
item.description: Episode 28 tells the story of Giles Corey, who was killed during the Salem witchcraft trials, on Septtember 19, 1692. Also, directions on how to make a Brigid's Cross. And, Meet the teachers of the Firefly Academy of Wicca and Witchcraft.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 28 tells the story of Giles Corey, who was killed during the Salem witchcraft trials, on Septtember 19, 1692. Also, directions on how to make a Brigid's Cross. And, Meet the teachers of the Firefly Academy of Wicca and Witchcraft.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 27
item.description: Episode 27 tells 3 of my personal stories in relation to magick that falls in the gray area between black and white...as well as what I have learned from them.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 27 tells 3 of my personal stories in relation to magick that falls in the gray area between black and white...as well as what I have learned from them.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 26
item.description: Episode 26 talks about Reiki, a Japanese technique for healing and stress relief. Also, the girls and I did some crafting when they were in town. Tune in for ideas as I recount our evening.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 26 talks about Reiki, a Japanese technique for healing and stress relief. Also, the girls and I did some crafting when they were in town. Tune in for ideas as I recount our evening.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 25
item.description: Episode 25 talks a bit about tonights full moon, the Celtic Tree Month of Vine, and has an update about the (now-stolen) Jesus Painting lawsuit. Also, a few questions in Wiccan trivia.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 25 talks a bit about tonights full moon, the Celtic Tree Month of Vine, and has an update about the (now-stolen) Jesus Painting lawsuit. Also, a few questions in Wiccan trivia.

item.description: Episode 24 is dedicated to Steve Irwin, the Crocodile Hunter, who was killed accidentally yesterday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 24 is dedicated to Steve Irwin, the Crocodile Hunter, who was killed accidentally yesterday.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 23
item.description: Episode 23 discusses astronomical and geological phenomena, and how they bring balance in nature. Also, food for thought about global warming.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 23 discusses astronomical and geological phenomena, and how they bring balance in nature. Also, food for thought about global warming.

item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 22 talks about Pagan Pride Day, my coven in the commmunication age, as well as my story of not-so-perfect love and broken trust.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 20
item.description: Episode 20 talks about current news topics. From tax enforcement on Romanian witches, and Astrology supersitions leading to abortions, as well as info on a contreversial article on Frobes.com that advised men not to marry career women.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 20 talks about current news topics. From tax enforcement on Romanian witches, and Astrology supersitions leading to abortions, as well as info on a contreversial article on Frobes.com that advised men not to marry career women.

item.description: Episode 19 discusses the four elements, Earth, Air, Fire, and Water. It also intorduces the Four Rooms assessment as a journaling technique.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 19 discusses the four elements, Earth, Air, Fire, and Water. It also intorduces the Four Rooms assessment as a journaling technique.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 14
item.description: Episode 14 talks Lady Iris' new friend, and how I nearly smashed him. That's how we met. We also discuss the different roles we play between our magickal and mundane lives. And...the Covenant is a new movie about witchy powers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 14 talks Lady Iris' new friend, and how I nearly smashed him. That's how we met. We also discuss the different roles we play between our magickal and mundane lives. And...the Covenant is a new movie about witchy powers.

item.title: The Firefly Chronicles - Episode 13
item.description: Episode 13 concludes the Rites of Passage series with Croning and Passing. Southern African Catholic Bishops say that some priests are resorting to witchcraft. And...a goat was crowned King of Ireland.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 13 concludes the Rites of Passage series with Croning and Passing. Southern African Catholic Bishops say that some priests are resorting to witchcraft. And...a goat was crowned King of Ireland.
